ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: For truly with hardship comes ease;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Surely with hardship there is ease.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Indeed, there is ease with hardship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: After every difficulty there is relief.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So indeed with hardship is ease.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, along with every hardship is relief,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So truly with hardship comes ease,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But lo! with hardship goeth ease,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So, surely with every hardship there is ease;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then verily along with every hardship is ease.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So, verily, with every difficulty, there is relief:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So verily, with the hardship, there is relief,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, hardship is followed by ease,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [94:5]   For truly with hardship comes ease.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah then said to comfort His prophet about his poverty and the hardships he faced, saying: (But lo! with hardship goeth ease, 762
